title: New Player Daily play rewards level 1-30 arn't working for me
body: Every day for 7 days players that are level 1-30 they get a reward however I cannot claim them. I just came back to the game after a year and a bit and whenever I log in I have the option to get a legend for free but when I go to select the legend I want the button goes away. I have hit esc and gone into my loot tab as the information on the daily rewards says to do and I cannot claim it there as a matter of fact it doesn't even show up. If anybody knows how to fix this I would much appriciate it if you could tell me how to please, thank you for listening to my rant and I pray that we can solve this.

replies.body:
>Thanks for reporting this, we'll need to gather some logs to investigate further. If you'd like to help us dig into this:

>1. Please download and install the [Hextech Repair Tool (HRT)](https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/player-support/tools/hextech-repair-tool/latest/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi). (If you've already got the HRT installed, uninstall it and then install this latest version.
2. Once you've opened the HRT, deselect the "Automatically Assign" and "Add Firewall Exceptions" options, we won't be needing those.
3. Click Start.
4. A .zip file will be created on your desktop called LoL Logs. Attach this file in an email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

>We will then pass these logs on for investigation.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL/d/ki4edZEm?comment=0000

You can also submit a ticket to player support and they may have some form of update for you as this was being investigated a little while ago.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
